name: Geometry Jump - Dash Up!
description:
A 1-touch minimalist adventure! Geometry Jump is a fun and addictive relay style skill game. Just dash up, collect diamonds and don't fall!

> Tap left to jump 1 square
> Tap right to jump 2 squares
> Avoid the holes
> Move fast for time extensions
> Collect diamonds and unlock new squares
> ..and most importantly- BEAT your friends

Suggestions? Email us at support@yololabs.com. If you like our game and want to support us, please do us a solid and write a review for Geometry Jump in the App Store!
